paper_abstract: A (3,6)-Fullerene is a 3-regular planar graph whose faces are triangles and hexagons. In this paper we compute the number of paths, independent sets and k-matchings of small size in an arbitrary (3,6)-fullerene. Then we compute the Wiener polarity of these graphs. We also present a lower bound for the number of perfect matching in these cubic graphs.
paper_title: On the Number of Matchings and Independent Sets in (3,6)-Fullerenes
